column1: I can see the Dems Piss Off Meter Rising! How dare those Dem Gov compliment Trump for his Coronavirus Response! That will make impeachment 2.0 unobtainable. The look on the faces of the Lame Stream Media Hosts is priceless!

Shapiro is right. Emperor Cuomo and Comrade DeBlas were totally unprepared for the Coronavirus Threat. They immediately got on camera and bad mouthed the President. Both men should had thank the President because he really provided cover for their incompetence!
